titles.title: A resolution congratulating the National Urban League on its 100th year of service to the United States.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
Urban and suburban affairs and development

bill.summary: 8/5/2010--Introduced. Commemorates the National Urban League's 100th year of service to the nation. Commends the League's ongoing efforts to address inequality and fight for the right of all people of the United States to live with freedom, dignity, and prosperity.
